abstract: Last week, Stephen A. Schwarzman brought the funny for his keynote speech at the Alfred E. Smith Memorial Foundation Dinner. Now, video of the roast has surfaced.
snippet: Last week, Stephen A. Schwarzman brought the funny for his keynote speech at the Alfred E. Smith Memorial Foundation Dinner. Now, video of the roast has surfaced.
lead_paragraph: Last week, we brought you highlights from a speech given by Stephen A. Schwarzman, the Blackstone Group co-founder, at the Alfred E. Smith Memorial Foundation Dinner. In the roast, which was widely circulated on Wall Street, Mr. Schwarzman lampooned, among others, Rupert Murdoch, Brian T. Moynihan and himself.
